issue.title: [Doc] Use dependencies from conda in C++ docker build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1765](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1765). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently dependencies are built from scratch mostly in the C++ build for the documentation instead of using the conda-installed ones. Setting `ARROW_BUILD_TOOLCHAIN=$CONDA_PREFIX` should improve build times.
